Text: REUTERS/Aly Song/File Photo (Reuters) - Tencent Holdings Ltd and private equity partner Hammer Capital have offered $16 per share to buy out the other shareholders in Chinese car comparison website Bitauto Holdings Ltd, valuing the company at just under $1.2 billion.
Cause: Tencent Holdings Ltd and private equity partner Hammer Capital have offered $16 per share to buy out the other shareholders in Chinese car comparison website Bitauto Holdings Ltd
Effect: valuing the company at just under $1.2 billion.
Sentence: REUTERS/Aly Song/File Photo (Reuters) - <e1>Tencent Holdings Ltd and private equity partner Hammer Capital have offered $16 per share to buy out the other shareholders in Chinese car comparison website Bitauto Holdings Ltd</e1>, <e2>valuing the company at just under $1.2 billion.</e2>
